external_games.name: Harem Tengoku da to Omottara Yandere Jigoku Datta
Harem Tengoku da to Omottara Yandere Jigoku Datta

name: Harem Tengoku da to Omottara Yandere Jigoku Datta
storyline:
The progatonist, Kisaragi Yuuya, is the deputy head of the local high school history research club, and the student council has spoken: show off something to the next cultural festival or kiss your club goodbye.

As such, Yuuya and his three fellow club members try to create a mascot character, Izaemon, to amass appeal for the club.

However what follows was something that no one could have ever predicted...
summary: Harem Tengoku da to Omottara Yandere Jigoku Datta is an visual novel, developed and published by Nippon Ichi Software, which was released in Japan in 2014.

videos.name: Teaser
videos.title: Not A Harem Heaven, It's A Yandere Hell [PS3 Teaser]
